General.Name: Polyrocks Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Polyrocks Chemical Co.,LTD researches, produces, and distributes environmental halogen-free flame retardant plastics. The company offers flame retardent, degradable plastics products, including blown film, extrusion, injection, and 3D printing materials; and glass filled and mineral filled PP products. It also provides polyolefin materials, engineering plastics, functional master batches, and elastomeric products are used in automobiles, smart home appliances, lighting, environmental protection wires, OA equipment, communication electronics, sanitary materials, plastics, televisions, and coatings, etc. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Qingyuan City, China.
General.Address: B6, Xiongxing Industrial Park, Qingyuan, China, 511540
